posts.text: L'école des élites, dont la plus emblématique est l'ENS, l'École Normale Supérieure. Macron en est le chien enragé, une caricature. posts.text:
I'm all in for Canada to put a federal referendum up for a vote in 2025 to join the EU. 

The process can take up to a decade historically.

Mark Carney was signed in yesterday and is heading to Europe next week after Macron in France and Starmer in the UK invited him to discuss trade and security.
